item.title: Quickstart
DBaaS
item.description: If you are looking for Database as a Service or managed databases, some are available on Clever Cloud: [MySQL]({{/< ref “/deploy/addon/mysql/mysql” >/}}) [PostgreSQL]({{/< ref “/deploy/addon/postgresql” >/}}) [MongoDB]({{/< ref “/deploy/addon/mongodb” >/}}) [Redis]({{/< ref “/deploy/addon/redis” >/}}) [Elastic]({{/< ref “/deploy/addon/elastic” >/}}) All Databases available on Clever Cloud have automated backups, monitoring, logs and metrics management.
